name: F.O.R.F (Friend or Foe) FPS
description:
Friend or Foe FPS is a single-player, first person shooter,  set in a low-poly open world.  

You and Gus have to find and kill the bad guys and protect the peasants against the invaders. Choose your weapons with care. You succeed when all the bad guys are dead and all the Peasants are alive.  Also, try to keep poor Gus alive, he will save you many times.

Note: Game is in early prototype stage. There are currently 4 playable test levels that will be expanded over time.

Let us know your favorite Level, your favorite weapon and favorite enemy.
